name: Christine Greer
text: We ordered a pizza. Around two hours later there were no updates about the order. When we called they claimed the order was cancelled and said we could reorder for full price and another hour wait. Wonâ€™t order from this location again.

name: Rob Bateman
text: Left the pizza on the porch without calling or texting like I had asked. This is the second time its happened. Only reason I left 2 stars is because the food was still kinda warm

name: Antonio McBagel
text: We waited for our big dinner box to be presented with burnt breadsticks to the point where all we could see was black, the pizza was noticeably old that even the pepperonis crumbled as they were touched. The manager was nice enough to issue â€¦More

name: amy Coppola
text: Ordered my pizza and wings and bread sticks they forgot my wings and was a lot more then I planned to pay its just getting to expensive there to feed my family

name: Betty Lester
text: The pizza and people that work there are awesome!!

name: Steve Rubalcava
text: As Pizza Huts go this is one of the best run franchises I've experienced. The employees are well trained and attentive to the customers. The food is served hot & well worth the money spent.

name: Vanillayote
text: Despite the busy night, they pulled through with our food in no time. 10/10 pizza experience

name: A V
text: Super delicious pizza. Loved it.

name: Alexa Melena
text: Pizza was good, garlic knots were pretty great, and the delivery girl was super cute. 5 stars.

name: Fr. George Parrish
text: Clean storefront, friendly staff and really good pizza! Try the Big Brownie. You won't be sorry!

name: woody brehm
text: Waited a long time,was only Two waiting, my Pizza fell apart had to wait for another.I will not go back there.  Staff very Slow. !

name: kevin baker
text: Not leave it on the table outside, late I deserve a new pizza

name: Carrie Rosales
text: Order not ready in time and we were told they would bring ot out to us, they did not

name: Michael Frattalone
text: Waited an hour for 2 pizzas and they forgot to put the pasta in the oven. They usually aren't this bad. Make sure you mention the 5 and up specials or they won't give the discount.

name: Phillip Hardt
text: Friendly and knowledgable workers.  Pizza'd were great and tasty!

name: Dallana Beltran Martinez
text: I love that I can custom make my pizza. The staff is friendly and easy to talk to. The games on the table are fun to play. I would live at the new Pizza Hut location on Willow Creek Road if I could.

name: Jennifer Chard
text: I love this Pizza Hut! I order a few times a week and am never disappointed by the food. Itâ€™s always hot, really tasty, and the staff is very friendly. They now have a wing street with all kinds of different wing flavors to choose from. In â€¦More

name: amy marshall
text: I have never used pizza hut delivery until tonight. Delivery time and driver were excellent.Pizza and Wings were good too. My only complaint is that warm cheese and pepper packets or napkins don't come with a 60$ order?? They need to be asked for upon ordering I was told when I called to confirm.So ....just a heads upâ˜º

name: Michele T
text: Absolutely no sauce on wings. This is pitiful. Tried posting a pic its so bad. No place to add a pic on mobile. Will be sending pics to manager.

name: Danny Flick
text: Cardboard with hardly any sauce, luke warm and took over and took over a hour to get. Not to mention $22 for 2 medium pizzas.

name: Sherri Soto
text: Pretty good pizza if you can get one of the deals. Otherwise to expensive.

name: Cassondra Gordon
text: Pizza Hut has moved to their new location.  They have wing street, a new selection of salads, and a whole lot more.  Everything is brand new and ultra modern.  They have a new quick lunch option so you can go in and get a great lunch within â€¦More

name: jeremiah covington
text: Well if your looking for 45 dollars for 2 medium pizzas  look no further overpriced should  of ordered 2momas!

name: Joe Dueck
text: So I live wood fired, Chicago Deep, New York Street, and even Californiaâ€™s broccoli thing but for delivery you simply cannot beat The Hut!! This one in Prescott is pretty dialed in too: nice folks and a clean, modern new look.  It for real: bring back the PRETZEL CRUST!!! ðŸ¥¨ ðŸ¤¬

name: Chels
text: We came in today to eat and recieved fantastic pizza and cutomer service from mike! He was so friendly and kind. What a great asset to your company. Crust was crispy like I like and hot:) we will be back!

name: Christopher Timoney
text: Casey was super helpful. Even helped me run two cards for one order over the phone. Patient and professional people here! AND THE WINGS ARE THE BEST IN TOWN!

name: Steven Francis
text: Friendly employees, restaurant is clean and the food is hot and fresh.

name: Thomas Rendleman
text: Good service and food.

name: Maria Santillan
text: My kids love pizza hut. Great service

name: patricia Bauer
text: 1st time back at Pizza Hut the pizza was all dough was not even cooked all the way through 1st they made the wrong pizza and we had to wait for another pizza then it was all  not didn'tdoneeven taste hot one of the worst pizzas ever

name: azmoman
text: Great wings

name: William Moore
text: Slow service. Extremely cold, uncomfortable chairs, very small salads,would not recommend  dining in. Pizza was o.k. very expensive.

name: Ron Avilla
text: I moved to Prescott Arizona and Pizza Hut does not even deliver to me they tell me the restaurant is outside of their delivery area are you kidding me. The restaurant itself is 3 miles away

name: Squibulous
text: This place was not a hit but they served pizzas, I think you see I didnâ€™t actually go there but IT WASNâ€™T A HUT!!!

name: Valorie Salzman
text: Very nice staff. Caitlyn was very kind!! Pizza was good!

name: ep R
text: Be honest, for the price, you can't complain, the pizza is good, and the salad is also quite good.

name: Ray M
text: Tried this place twice not good compared to other pizza huts

name: Rosie Brown, R.N.
text: Very good service and pizza.

name: Athena Sligo
text: Great food I love it. Their wings are amazing.

name: Justin Mckee
text: Love the new location.  Board games for the family to play while eating.  Clean.  Friendly staff

name: Can't Beehave
text: Great pizza and the wings are spot on and comparable to the wings at Buffalo Wild Wings.

name: Shivam Patel
text: Has college teens working but they can make a damn fine pizza both hand tossed and pan.

name: James Gibson
text: Good food & service , pretty clean !....

name: Jill Woods
text: Ordering was a pleasure, delivery was quick and my pizza was still hot! Thanks Jen and Jane

name: Zachary Smith
text: Online order worked out great.

name: Brittany Fermic
text: Some if the worst pizza my family has ever had. The pizza was cold, dry and the crust was awful. Maybe they were having an off day, but my family and I will not go back here again. Ick, it was like cardboard with some cheese on it.

name: Bryan Nash
text: Absolutely horrid service.

name: Kyle Sullivan
text: Very skimpy on toppings

name: Tonia Stilen
text: Very Good Service

name: Tony Walgraeve
text: I called for delivery and was told I was out of there delivery zone of 10 minutes distance,  I explained to them I was closer than 10 minutes away and they refused because there information showed it was longer than 10 minutes,,, I googled address from my house to their store,  what a surprise 8 minutes.

name: Loretta Tanaka
text: Good
